title: Great assortment
content: These are my go to tampons. I love the assortment of sizes to meet all of my needs throughout my cycle. The applicator is smooth, round with no blunt edges and easy to use. The string is braided and helps prevent leaks. The wrapper opens easily and is great to put the applicator in before it goes into the trash can. They are comfortable to wear, stay in place and work really well. Definitely recommend them.
